page.title: 11LOCAL COUNTRY EVENTS
page.content: Each year there are several local events held in aid of charity and to make money for the restoration of the local church ; one of these is the annual Chiddingly Horse Show and Gymkhana (also to include a Novelty Dog Show !). This is held every year at Highlands Farm in aid of St. John's Ambulance and local charities. The locals are asked to bake cakes or make something for the refreshment tent.This year is it's 33rd Year. The show was held on the 11th of August 1985 and started at nine o'clock and finished at approximately six o'clock.
